name: Self-Service Terminal
description: A system to provide certain services like mobile phone top-ups and payment of bills using cash/card via a vending machine as a terminal. Provides the transaction terminals and a management portal for managing the terminals and the associated transactions.
role: Worked as a back-end developer on the SST server writing REST APIs using ASP.NET Web API to provide CRUD operations, authentication, authorization, and terminal sync operations
Worked on the front-end portal application for terminal management using Angular 6
Worked on Roles Based Authorization and Multi-tenancy support
Worked as full stack developer on the terminal application using WPF, SQLITE, Dapper, Serilog, and Grid-Extra
Developed interfaces to hardware devices including Payout (SSP Protocol), Cash Validator, Card Reader, and Printer devices using COM and Serial Port Communications
Conducted R&D on each of the individual devices involved
Worked on the transaction sync manager to make the application more robust and responsive even in case of network unavailability
Developed an Android application for terminal agents using Xamrin forms for agent verification and terminal maintenance management
